key.desc: Electric power ON and Start Engines and Rotor Gear ON
Shutdown Engines and Electric power OFF

key.text:
That Helicopter is loaded with: Electric power OFF Engines and Rotor Gear OFF Rotor Brake ON Brake-Parking ON
START and STOP ROUTINE To start: 1 Electric Power ON , Rotor Brake OFF, start the engine and rotorgear ON => key "}" To stop: Electric Power, Engine and Rotorgear OFF => key "{"
